reviewText: These DVDs are helpful, for sure.  They show many beautiful pictures (letters, numbers, stories) and how to achieve them with the primary colors.  One complaint is that it is very shakily filmed.  There are times when it is quite distracting to watch.  Really, I think it should remade, but it does fill an important gap and the artist clearly knows what she is doing.  If I had it to do over, I would choose the book instead.
